hooks.prompt: Check if this is a feature branch (not main/master). If so, check if PLAN.md exists at .claude/pdd/{branch}/PLAN.md (or $PDD_WORKSPACE_DIR/{branch}/PLAN.md if set). If no PLAN exists, briefly note that /pdd:plan is available for planning.
Review this session. If significant discoveries, unexpected issues, or important technical decisions were made during implementation, suggest running /pdd:notes to capture them before ending.
